content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to activate the arcgis environment using various shell commands, but encountered errors indicating that the necessary files could not be found. The AI response provided a series of commands to install and activate the necessary files, but each attempt resulted in a failure. The latest attempts involved using the commands ". /opt/conda/bin/activate arcgis && echo 'Environment activated.'" and "source /opt/conda/bin/activate arcgis && echo 'Environment activated.'" but both failed with an error indicating that the necessary file could not be found. I received several more AI responses with additional commands to activate the environment, but all attempts failed with the same error message.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "/opt/miniconda3/bin/conda activate arcgis && echo 'Environment activated.'"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:
b''

b'/bin/sh: 1: /opt/miniconda3/bin/conda: not found\n'", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": ". /opt/conda/bin/activate arcgis && echo 'Environment activated.'"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:
